entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Mingan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:27 a.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 2.
